Container.Name: Ryot
Container.Overview: A self-hosted platform for tracking various facets of your life - media, fitness etc.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: tracker media fitness video games music podcasts anime manga download books movies shows tv series audiobooks twitch itunes tmdb server audible mal anilist google

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 8000

Config.Name: Server - Admin Access Token
Config.Description: An access token that can be used for admin operations.

Config.Name: Server - Pro Key
Config.Description: Key to activate pro features. If left blank, will default to community edition.

Config.Name: Server - SMTP - Address
Config.Description: The email address to send emails from.

Config.Name: Server - SMTP - Host
Config.Description: The SMTP host to send emails from.

Config.Name: Server - SMTP - User
Config.Description: The SMTP user to send emails from.

Config.Name: Server - SMTP - Password
Config.Description: The SMTP password to send emails from.

Config.Name: UI - URL
Config.Description: Used as the base URL when generating item links for the frontend.

Config.Name: Security - Allow Registration
Config.Description: Allow users to register for an account.

Config.Name: Security - JWT Token Secret
Config.Description: The secret used for generating JWT tokens.

Config.Name: Security - Disable Local Auth
Config.Description: Whether to disable local user authentication completely.

Config.Name: Security - OIDC - Client ID
Config.Description: The client ID for OIDC authentication.

Config.Name: Security - OIDC - Client Secret
Config.Description: The client secret for OIDC authentication.

Config.Name: Security - OIDC - Issuer URL
Config.Description: The issuer URL for OIDC authentication.

Config.Name: Database - URL
Config.Description: URL of the Postgres database

Config.Name: File Storage - S3 - Access Key ID
Config.Description: The access key ID for the S3 compatible file storage. Required to enable file storage.

Config.Name: File Storage - S3 - Secret Access Key
Config.Description: The secret access key for the S3 compatible file storage. Required to enable file storage.

Config.Name: FIle Storage - S3 - URL
Config.Description: The URL for the S3 compatible file storage. Required to enable file storage.

Config.Name: File Storage - S3 - Region
Config.Description: The region for the S3 compatible file storage. Required to enable file storage.

Config.Name: File Storage - S3 - Bucket
Config.Description: The bucket name for the S3 compatible file storage. Required to enable file storage.

Config.Name: Media - Monitoring Length
Config.Description: Number of days after which a media should be removed from the Monitoring collection.

Config.Name: Anime/Manga - Anilist - Preferred Language
Config.Description: The preferred language for Anilist data.

Config.Name: Anime/Manga - MAL - Client ID
Config.Description: The client ID issued by MAL.

Config.Name: Audiobooks - Audible - Locale
Config.Description: The locale for Audible data.

Config.Name: Books - Google Books - API Key
Config.Description: The API key issued by Google Books.

Config.Name: Books - Google Books - Pass Raw Query
Config.Description: Whether to pass the raw query string to the search API.

Config.Name: Books - Hardcover - API Key
Config.Description: The API key issued by Hardcover.

Config.Name: Books - Openlibrary - Cover Image Size
Config.Description: The size of the cover image to fetch from Openlibrary.

Config.Name: Movies/Shows - TMDB - Access Token
Config.Description: The access token issued by TMDB.

Config.Name: Movies/Shows - TMDB - Locale
Config.Description: The preferred language for TMDB data.

Config.Name: Podcasts - iTunes - Locale
Config.Description: The locale for iTunes data.

Config.Name: Podcasts - Listennotes - API Token
Config.Description: The API token issued by Listennotes.

Config.Name: Video Games - IGDB - Image Size
Config.Description: The size of the cover image to fetch from IGDB.

Config.Name: Video Games - Twitch - Client ID
Config.Description: The client ID issued by Twitch. Required to enable video games tracking.

Config.Name: Video Games - Twitch - Client Secret
Config.Description: The client secret issued by Twitch. Required to enable video games tracking.

Config.Name: Internal Port
Config.Description: Internal port of the container. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Server - CORS Origins
Config.Description: An array of URLs for CORS origins.

Config.Name: Server - Disable Background Jobs
Config.Description: Disable background jobs

Config.Name: Server - Progress Update Threshold
Config.Description: The hours in which a media can be marked as seen again for a user. This is used so that the same media can not be used marked as started when it has been already marked as seen in the last `n` hours.

Config.Name: Server - Enable GraphQL Playground
Config.Description: Enable the GraphQL playground

Config.Name: Server - Enable Demo Mode
Config.Description: Enable demo mode

Config.Name: Server - Max File Size
Config.Description: The maximum file size, in MB, for user uploads.

Config.Name: Server - Startup Sleep
Config.Description: The number of seconds to sleep before starting the server.

Config.Name: UI - Dashboard Message
Config.Description: A message to be displayed on the dashboard.

Config.Name: UI - OIDC Button
Config.Description: The button label for OIDC authentication.

Config.Name: Security - User Token Validity
Config.Description: The number of days till login authentication token is valid.

Config.Name: Analytics - Disable Telemetry
Config.Description: Opt out of telemetry metrics

Config.Name: Analytics - Domain Names
Config.Description: Comma separated list of domain names to provide in analytics

Config.Name: Analytics - Script URL
Config.Description: URL of the Umami analytics script. For example: https://umami.is/script.js

Config.Name: Analytics - Website ID
Config.Description: The website ID for Umami analytics

Config.Name: Integrations - Sync Time
Config.Description: Sync data from push and yank based integrations every `n` minutes.
